검색

Research Goal

        2021 Research Trend
        • Improve systematic plan to revitalize gender equality policies of all ministries and discover policy tasks
          o Establish measures to improve gender mainstreaming system
          o Expand production of empirical data to promote gender equality policy
          o Strengthen the effectiveness of the system for promoting gender equality policies
        • Develop multi-disciplinary policies to realize inclusive gender equality
          o Repond to "gender conflict" and suggest strategies to spread gender equality awareness
          o Establish policies to resolve discrimination and secure diversity
          o Implement global gender equality agenda at home and abroad and strengthen gender mainstreaming in development cooperation
        • Discover practical gender equality policies related to aging society, low birthrate and family diversity
          o Prepare gender-related issues and policy measures for responding to aging society
          o Prepare action plans to promote gender equal low birth rate policy
          o Develop laws, systems, and policies related to new family forms
        • Improve the ability implement policies on prevention of violence against women after the Me Too Movement
          o Lay the foundation for practical implementation of Framework Act on Prevention of Violence against Women
          o Carry out in-depth analysis of gender violence patterns
          o Improves system to guarantee women's reproductive and health rights
        • Strengthen the execution of gender equal women's labor policy
          o Suggest strategies to strengthen gender-sensitivity in labor policy
          o Innovate women's job creation
          o Enhance the possibility of realizing gender equality and work-life balance policy
